verses.verse: The heavens<WH8064> declare<WH5608> the glory<WH3519> of God.<WH410> The expanse<WH7549> shows his<WH5046> handiwork.<WH4639>
Day<WH3117> after day<WH3117> they pour<WH5042> forth speech,<WH562> and night<WH3915> after night<WH3915> they display<WH2331> knowledge.<WH1847>
There is no speech<WH562> nor language,<WH1697> where their voice<WH6963> is not heard.<WH8085>
Their voice<WH6957> has gone out<WH3318> through all the earth,<WH776> their words<WH4405> to the end<WH7097> of the world.<WH8398> In them he has set<WH7760> a tent<WH168> for the sun,<WH8121>
which is as a bridegroom<WH2860> coming out<WH3318> of his room,<WH2646> like a strong man<WH1368> rejoicing<WH7797> to run<WH7323> his course.<WH734>
His going forth<WH4161> is from the end<WH7097> of the heavens,<WH8064> his circuit<WH8622> to its ends;<WH7098> There is nothing hidden<WH5641> from its heat.<WH2535>
Yahweh<WH3068>'s law<WH8451> is perfect,<WH8549> restoring<WH7725> the soul.<WH5315> Yahweh<WH3068>'s testimony<WH5715> is sure,<WH539> making wise<WH2449> the simple.<WH6612>
Yahweh<WH3068>'s precepts<WH6490> are right,<WH3477> rejoicing<WH8055> the heart.<WH3820> Yahweh<WH3068>'s commandment<WH4687> is pure,<WH1249> enlightening<WH215> the eyes.<WH5869>
The fear<WH3374> of Yahweh<WH3068> is clean,<WH2889> enduring<WH5975> forever.<WH5703> Yahweh<WH3068>'s ordinances<WH4941> are true,<WH571> and righteous<WH6663> altogether.<WH3162>
More to be desired<WH2530> are they than gold,<WH2091> yes,<WH7227> than much fine gold;<WH6337> sweeter<WH4966> also than honey<WH1706> and the extract of the honeycomb.<WH5317>
Moreover by them is your servant<WH5650> warned.<WH2094> In keeping<WH8104> them there is great<WH7227> reward.<WH6118>
Who can discern<WH995> his errors?<WH7691> Forgive<WH5352> me from hidden errors.<WH5641>

Keep back<WH2820> your servant<WH5650> also from presumptuous<WH2086> sins.<WH4910> Let them not have dominion over me.<WH8552> Then I will be upright. I will be blameless and innocent<WH5352> of great<WH7227> transgression.<WH6588>
Let the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310> and the meditation<WH1902> of my heart<WH3820> be acceptable<WH7522> in your sight,<WH6440> Yahweh,<WH3068> my rock,<WH6697> and my redeemer.<WH1350>
